column1: #text=I wanted to visit my friend in the city , but I did n't have a car .
#text=So , I decided to take the train .
#text=I walked to the train station and went up to the ticket counter .
#text=I asked for a ticket to the city where my friend lived and asked for the one that would depart the soonest .
#text=The ticket person sold me a ticket and I paid for it in cash .
#text=I called my friend and told them when I would be arriving to the train station near them .
#text=I waited by the train terminal for my train .
#text=When the train arrived I boarded the train and took a seat .
#text=The train passed many stops and finally I reached the stop that I wanted .
#text=I got off the train and saw my friend waiting for me to pick me up .
#text=The train had arrived at exactly the time that was stated on the ticket .
